string.value: #p1101002# thanks you for protecting the tears of the Divine Bird and wants to give you a reward for it. You'd better head over to #b#m130000000##k.
As a token of his appreciation, #p1101002# taught you a new skill and mumbled that he hoped you might one day join forces with him. That smile of his seemed to convey a million subtle meanings.
Hello, Aran. I see that you are bit busy right now, but please, allow me to speak.

Thanks to your timely warning, we were able to protect the Seal Stone of #m130000000#...#bor what we'd call Shinsoo's Teardrop#k. Thank you so much and allow me to give you a reward for your hard work. Can you please come to #m130000000# immediately? I'll be waiting.
For you to reject the offer… I see that you're more modest than I thought. Please also know that too much modesty will actually make you look foolish. Please reconsider.
Ah, you're here. Honestly, at first, I didn't believe you at all. I sensed you had a very different aura, and the contents of the letter seemed way too real. That's why I had my suspicions about you.

But after a thorough background search, I realized that those worries were unfounded. Even that offensive aura of yours...#bI can understand, based on your very dynamic past#k... Ah, don't mind me. I was just thinking out loud. Here's the reward for your work.

I know this doesn't seem much, but I am sure it'll help you on your journey. Do not feel pressured by this or anything. #bWe may end up joining forces someday you know#k... That was me thinking out loud again. We'll meet again someday. Goodbye for now.
